programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: When TE Lawrence is attached to the British general staff in Arabia, he inspires the feuding Arabian chieftains to rebel against the Turks, leading to the birth of the Arabian kingdom.

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturised in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A couple rescues a half-delirious sole survivor of a crippled schooner, but soon the stranger will plunge the unwary pair into an intense battle of cat and mouse. And life or death.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befall their small town, an offbeat group of friends led by Sidney Prescott become the target of a masked killer.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: With the help of a seismology student, Val and Earl discover their desolate town is infested with huge man-eating creatures living below the ground. The race is on to defeat these slimy subterraneans.

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: A classic comedy based around a group of WWII soldiers who plan to steal a treasure trove from the Nazis.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: When TE Lawrence is attached to the British general staff in Arabia, he inspires the feuding Arabian chieftains to rebel against the Turks, leading to the birth of the Arabian kingdom.

programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: A big-hearted family man's plan for a peaceful getaway at a lakeside resort is ruined when his obnoxious brother-in-law turns up with his weirdo brood.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: Samantha's 16th birthday should be perfect and memorable. But her whole family is preoccupied with her sister's wedding and completely forgets Samantha's big day.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities.

programme.title: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: A year after his friend's death, Gabe must return to the dreaded mountain peaks, where he finds himself trapped in a desperate battle against criminals, nature and himself.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Run by the shadowy Consumer Recreations Services, the Game never quite declares its rules or objectives, but soon Nicholas finds himself in its grasp, and his ordered life starts to fall apart.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Two years after the tragic events that plagued Sidney she's moved to college putting the shocking killings behind her. That is until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel.

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1980 cult classic, Jake and Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God".

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: A secret agent is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities.

programme.desc: A Russian submarine commander attempts to defect to the US, bringing both sides to the brink of war.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: Greed, deception, money and murder envelop two mobsters and a devious trophy wife running a Las Vegas casino.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Onomichi Betcha is a three-day festival in Hiroshima Prefecture. Masked ogres carry sticks with which to "torment" spectators. But being hit or poked with a stick is said to bring good luck.

programme.title: NHK World Selection
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-12.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japan is a hot spot for discovering dinosaur fossils. An excavation in Hokkaido sparked a nationwide enthusiasm for dinosaurs, leading to entertainment such as dinosaur robots and mechanical suits.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: We spend a day with the cats of Shinjuku Golden-Gai, a retro bar district in Tokyo. One cat goes on a quiet morning patrol. At night, customers visit a bar where they can drink with two cats.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: Explore the world of anime sound! Voice actor Otsuka Akio recreates past sessions, revealing techniques behind iconic lines. And in the studio, composer Inai Keiji works on a new anime score.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u & i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia's capital, is an urban center with 2 million people. It is the cultural, tourism, political, and economic core of Malaysia, driving growth through industrialization and IT hubs.

programme.title: National Parks of Japan
programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: Ramen Japan

programme.desc: Today: making a polite request to a superior. Jorge Andres Arevalos Ibarra, from Paraguay, works at a metalworking company. In a roleplay challenge, he makes a polite request to a higher-up.

programme.desc: "They're not trash cans, but resource bins," says Murakami Yuki, transforming garbage and scrap into useful materials. This sort of alchemy has earned praise and serious interest from industry.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia's capital, is an urban center with 2 million people. It is the cultural, tourism, political, and economic core of Malaysia, driving growth through industrialization and IT hubs.

programme.title: National Parks of Japan
programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Chatroom Japan puts a spotlight on our diverse international community.We report on the issues, speak to those involved, and get a fresh look at what it's like to live in Japan.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: A recent report by the WMO announced that Asia's climate change is proceeding at twice the rate of the rest of the world. We investigate this situation leading to a range of natural disasters.

programme.title: The Playfulness of Plasterers
programme.desc: Ehime / Nagazumi Takashi (musician) Nagazumi visits a town with a great number of trowel reliefs, and observes that the things that truly last are the ones that carry the creator's intention.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: In Tokyo, we meet Syrian Iskandar Salama who works to find job opportunities for his fellow Syrians in and out of Japan, then go on a river ride in Tochigi with Nepalese Shishir Mahat as our guide.

programme.title: KAIZOKU
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: The number of visitors to Japan is rising. However, many do not know what to do during an earthquake, tsunami or typhoon. Find out the technologies being developed to protect visitors from disasters.

programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to insects. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: The Hit

programme.title: Howling IV: The Original Nightmare
programme.desc: A successful author moves to a small town after suffering a mental breakdown and is tormented by demons and werewolves.

programme.title: Howling V: The Rebirth
programme.desc: A werewolf stalks an eclectic group of travellers on hand to attend the opening of a long-sealed European castle.

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A very handsome gentleman finds the love of his life, but suffers an accident and needs to have his face reconstructed through surgery after being severely disfigured.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: The Parts You Lose
programme.desc: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
programme.desc: The heroes in a half-shell are back. Our fearsome foursome go after the glowing canister that has slipped into the hands of the evil Shredder and his mutant allies, Rahzar and Tokka.

programme.title: God is a Bullet
programme.desc: After his ex-wife is murdered and his daughter is kidnapped, Bob Hightower, infiltrates the group to hunt down their leader with the help of the cult's only female victim escapee.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: When dangerous criminals on a cargo ship are transported from the Phillipines to South Korea, they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Hell House LLC III: Lake Of Fire
programme.desc: The Abaddon Hotel will once again be open to the public. Russell Wynn has taken his audience-interactive show, Insomnia, into the abandoned hotel that is rumored to be haunted.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: Late one night on a country road, Tun and Jane accidentally run over a mysterious pedestrian. Fleeing the scene, they return to their lives in Bangkok, but soon discover things have changed.

programme.title: Hellraiser
programme.desc: A horrifying, living-dead version of Julia's husband appears and coerces her to seduce and kill men so that he can feed on their blood to regain his flesh.

programme.title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
programme.desc: Kristy Cotton is in a psychiatric hospital reliving the hellish events pertaining to a certain puzzle box that contains deadly spirits.

programme.title: The Wind
programme.desc: Lizzy is settling a remote stretch of land on the 19th-century American frontier, when she begins to sense a sinister presence that seems to be borne of the land itself.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: Teenagers are tortured, chopped up and impaled on meat hooks by a demented backwards family. This grisly 1974 blood-curdler ranks with Psycho and Halloween as a landmark in the horror/slasher genre.

programme.title: Final Cut
programme.desc: Life imitates art when the cast and crew of a low-budget zombie flick start to turn into the living dead.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: A hit man is sent to Spain to kidnap an ex-criminal and transport him to Paris for execution.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
programme.desc: When a magic sceptre accidentally transports April back through time to 16th-century Japan, the boys take off in hot pursuit, cowabungling their way right out of the sewers.

programme.title: Sound of Silence
programme.desc: Emma must uncover the dark secret behind a cursed radio to survive and protect her family.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: As the seconds tick down to midnight, an ex-con becomes a reluctant hero trapped by a masked "Collector" in a maze of lethal invention while trying to rescue the very family he came to rob.

programme.title: The House That Jack Built
programme.desc: USA in the 1970s. We follow the highly intelligent Jack over a span of 12 years and are introduced to the murders that define his development as a serial killer.

programme.title: Prisoners Of The Ghostland
programme.desc: In the treacherous frontier city of Samurai Town, a notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Caligula: The Ultimate Cut
programme.desc: Excess, violence and corruption mark the notorious emperor's reign in first-century Rome.

programme.title: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
programme.desc: Act three in the horror series based on a Stephen King story. Two brothers are adopted by a family. Deadly occurrences follow, amid revelations that one boy was in a bizarre cult in Nebraska.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Super Mario Bros.
programme.desc: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: The Chaser
programme.desc: A cop investigates the disappearance of several call girls he pimps out.

programme.title: Corrective Measures
programme.desc: When a powerless new inmate arrives at a prison for supervillains, he must choose his friends wisely, or become a pawn in the deadly game between the Warden and The Lobe.

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman (Jackie Chan) must protect a female witness (Brigitte Lin) from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work.

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop's unusual policing methods result in his demotion to traffic duty, despite his success in fighting crime. Meanwhile, an old enemy is released from prison and sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: District B13: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Explosive sequel set in a futuristic Paris. Corrupt cops conspire to launch a nuclear strike and take over a ghetto terrorised by marauding drug gangs and killers. Subtitles.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Paranoia drives this hi-tech cyber thriller when a computer programmer who turns to corporate espionage is caught in a spiral where even his own identity is put in doubt.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Sole-survivor of a plane crash, and stranded deep within the Arctic Circle, Overgard is waiting to be rescued, when a sudden turn of events finds him no longer on his own.

programme.title: Deliver Us
programme.desc: When a nun in a remote convent claims immaculate conception, priests investigate, concerned she will give birth to twin boys: one the Messiah, the other the Anti-Christ.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: When dangerous criminals on a cargo ship are transported from the Phillipines to South Korea, they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood And Honey 2

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: A reluctant IRA agent discovers that some people just aren't who you expect them to be.

programme.title: Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Two gunrunners and a pregnant policewoman (Tracy Scoggins) are trapped in a warehouse with a bad boy's toys.

programme.title: Top Knot Detective
programme.desc: Takashi Takamoto begins writing jingles for a well-known Japanese company and ends up creating a bloody series of samurai action that, over time, becomes a cult series.

programme.title: Puppet Master

programme.desc: The malicious marionettes are back to resurrect their dead master and evict parapsychologists from the family estate.

programme.title: Upstream Color
programme.desc: A woman is abducted and hypnotised with an organic material harvested from a specific flower. When she falls for a man, the two realise he may also have been subjected to the same process.

programme.title: District B13
programme.desc: Captain Damien must team up with Leito, a local insurgent from District 13, to defuse a neutron bomb that has fallen into the hands of a local drug lord, Taha, and rescue Leito's sister Lola.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.desc: A gangster starts a violent feud after he refuses to kill his boss's cheating girlfriend.
